name: getpopulationbycountrycode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_population.
Tool description: Get interesting information about countries' population
API description: Get the population's data of a country by its country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 format). More information at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3.

countrycode.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code representing the country.
